'''Kagemni''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in [[Aaru Village]], [[Sumeru]]. After completion of [[Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises]], he will be relocated to the village center where he will be scolded by [[Kulsoom]].

==Dialogue==
===Dialogue Set #1===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Before completing ''Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises'')
:'''Kagemni:''' What are you staring at, huh?
:'''Kagemni:''' Just look at you! Could it be that you're a lapdog of the [[Dendro Archon]]?
:{{DIcon}} ...
::'''Kagemni:''' As desert-dwellers, it is our duty to retain our faith in [[King Deshret]]!
::'''Kagemni:''' He will return to us, and when that day comes, he will return the faithful to our former prosperity and glory!
::'''Kagemni:''' As for those of you who betrayed King Deshret... You'll pay for all that you've done!
:{{DIcon}} ...
::'''Kagemni:''' Hah! Thought as much.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Dialogue Set #2===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(After completing ''Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises'')
:'''Kulsoom:''' Do you now understand where you went wrong?
:'''Kagemni:''' Yes... I know...
:'''Kulsoom:''' And where was that exactly?
:'''Kagemni:''' I... I shouldn't have trusted in rumors...
:'''Kulsoom:''' And?
:'''Kagemni:''' And, uh... I... I shouldn't have gone babbling to your grandson about that hearsay?
:'''Kulsoom:''' Well, that was wrong of you, yes, but is that really the most important thing?
:'''Kulsoom:''' What's the point of just "knowing" things? Do them! That's the important part!
:'''Kulsoom:''' It's because you're always lounging around at home that you wound up believing those baseless rumors!
:'''Kulsoom:''' You're still young &mdash; you've still got all the time in the world to learn new things. Why don't you follow [[Setaria]]'s example and go study?
:'''Kagemni:''' Y&mdash;Yes, you're right...
{{Dialogue End}}
